content.question: “But” in line 33 indicates a shift that serves both to conclude the unspoken dialogue and to

choices.label: reiterate the speaker’s determination to travel
signal a new intensity in the speaker’s emotions
introduce a new threat to the speaker’s freedom
signal the speaker’s acceptance of his position

content.answer: signal the speaker’s acceptance of his position

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
